description: delete lines from ds, get_var checks after

processingCommand.script:
!:data source variable name
:SET &DATASOURCE = "AE_TEST_DPG_3"
!:------------------------------------
:DELETE_VAR  &DATASOURCE,NEW1
:DELETE_VAR  &DATASOURCE,new2
:DELETE_VAR  &DATASOURCE,nEw3

!:check if correct value is there
:SET &VAR1A = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "NEW1", 1)
:PRINT &VAR1A 
:SET &VAR1B = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "new2", 1)
:PRINT &VAR1B 
:SET &VAR1C = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "nEw3", 1)
:PRINT &VAR1C 

:IF  &VAR1A <> ""
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 1a"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR1B <> ""
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 1b"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR1C <> ""
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 1b"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
